entry.summary: Snow is possible above 600 metres early Tuesday morning. 1 to 3 cm of snow may accumulate near the summit during Tuesday morning, with lesser amounts down to 600 metres.

entry.summary: Snow is expected to lower to 800 metres early Monday morning. 1 to 2 cm of snow may accumulate on the road about the summit until early afternoon, with lesser amounts lower down.

entry.summary: Snow may affect the summit of the road around midday Monday. Between late morning and mid-afternoon, 1 cm of snow may accumulate at the summit.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to lower to 700 metres early Monday morning. 1 to 3 cm of snow may accumulate on the road near the summit until early Monday afternoon, with lesser amounts to lower levels. Further snow is likely above 500 metres overnight Monday to Tuesday with another 1 to 2 cm accumulating near the summit

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected to lower to 700 metres Monday evening then to 500 metres early Tuesday morning. 3 to 6 cm of snow could accumulate near the summit Monday night and Tuesday morning, with lesser amounts down to 500 metres.
